body:
Hello!
I've been making a texture pack last week with my friend killerbye22.
The name is my name + killerbye's name mixed, erickillerV22 ( we just didn't have a better name :/ ) c:
Here are some screenies : 
http://imgur.com/a/eOzsz
And, the download :D : 
https://www.mediafire.com/?mvb1nmid0c8kanw
Thanks for reading, Hope you enjoy, leave feedbacks below :D
~Eric & Killer

replies.body:
It's funny, because I'm making a texture pack with the Mountain Dew logo as sharpness particles as well as a Doritos bag as the golden apple.
:l

But nice job! Really love the sword and pickaxe design, and, while the inventory has too much graphics for my taste, it does look really cool.
I personally don't like colored hearts (other than red) or the numbers on the hotbar, but that's just my personal opinion.
replies.body_tagged:
It's funny, because I'm making a texture pack with the Mountain Dew logo as sharpness particles as well as a Doritos bag as the golden apple.
:l

But nice job! Really love the sword and pickaxe design, and, while the inventory has too much graphics for my taste, it does look really cool.
I personally don't like colored hearts (other than red) or the numbers on the hotbar, but that's just my personal opinion.

replies.body:
Thanks c: 
I just tried make it good for people to use:
-Funny : The golden apple and sharpness particle.
-Design and detail : Taken from other resource packs and edited by me and killerbye.
-Comfortable to use : Numbers on otbar and good square for aiming.
Yeah, Respect you all opinion :)
